content: roya scarf information yarn 100 g fingering yarn 100 g/400 m needles 3 5 mm circular needle 60-80 cm long or size needed to get gauge gauge in pattern 23 stitches = 10 cm 34 row = 10 cm after washing keep in mind gauge is not critical in this project but will affect yardage and final size when different size 26 x 155 cm see measurements material tapestry needle notes roya scarf is a knitted small scarf starts and ends with a triangle tip before start knitting weigh your yarn the first time and after row 124 the second time the consumption for part 1 is also required for part 3 have this in mind also determine the consumption of one repetition row 125 to 134 this allows you to calculate how many repeats you can make with your yarn i recommend a scarf length of 145-160 cm if you have any questions please contact me kalmknit@online de hope you enjoy the instructions copyrights by kalmknit - kalmknit@online de f or personal use only any reproduction or distribution is stric tly forbidden page 1 of 6 abbreviations instruction bef before section 1 co cast on see also chart k knit section 1 row 1 64 and row 65 - 124 k2tog knit 2 stitches together co 5 sts m1l make one left see specials row 1 k5 p purl row 2 slpw2 p slpw2 repeat repeat row 3 k2 m1l p k2 rs right side row 4 slpw2 k p slpw2 slpw2 slip two stitches purlwise with yarn in row 5 k2 m1l k p k2 front row 6 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 st s stitch/stitches row 7 k2 m1l k2 p k2 ssk slip slip knit slip two stitches one at a row 8 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 time knitwise to the righthand needle row 9 k2 m1l k3 p k2 return stitches to left-hand needle in row 10 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 turned position and knit them together row 11 k2 m1l k4 p k2 through the back loops row 12 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 ws wrong side melle 5 die dritte row 13 k2 m1l k5 p k2 yo yarn over row 14 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 row 15 k2 m1l k k2tog k2 yo k p k2 specials row 16 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 spska rt 2 rhtetppse /a/ytsoutu be/0iiu9ej-lgo row 17 k2 m1l k k2tog k2 yo k2 p k2 m1l make one left with left needle pick up row 18 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 horizontal bar from front and knit 1 through row 19 k2 m1l k k2tog k2 yo k3 p k2 back loop row 20 slpw2 k p to last 2 sts slpw2 row 21 k2 m1l k k2tog k2 yo k4 p k2 measurements row 22 slpw2 k p to last 2
